sentences.en: All around me leaves twirl to the ground.
sentences.cn: 在我周围，树叶打着转儿纷纷飘落到地上。

sentences.en: Bonnie twirled her empty glass in her fingers.
sentences.cn: 邦妮用手指转动着她的空杯子。

sentences.en: He made the ice twirl in his glass.
sentences.cn: 他使他杯中的冰块旋转.

sentences.en: He walks along briskly, twirl his cane in the air.
sentences.cn: 他一边轻快地走著, 一边用手杖在空中旋转.

sentences.en: How does a dragonfly twirl and dive in flight?
sentences.cn: 蜻蜓在飞行中是如何旋转和俯冲的?

sentences.en: Just a little twirl here and a yank there and – Voiolay!
sentences.cn: 你只要在这里稍微转动一下,再用力一拉,哇!

sentences.en: Several hundred people twirl around the ballroom dance floor.
sentences.cn: 几百人在舞厅的舞池里旋转。

sentences.en: She did a quick twirl to show off her dress.
sentences.cn: 她轻快地一转身,炫耀自己所穿的衣服.

sentences.en: She did a twirl in front of the mirror.
She did twirl in front of the mirror.
They twist and twirl as if struggling against the breeze.
When I was young, I twirl in the fields of wildflowers that grew in my backyard.
sentences.cn: 在我小的时候我就喜欢在我那个长满野花的后院里旋转舞蹈.

sentences.en: You twirl your pen around your fingers.
You will learn to make, twirl and fill a genuine pizza, the real way.
sentences.cn: 你将了解到如何制作批撒饼并且真实的参与操作.

words.tran_cn: 转动，旋转；旋转的东西；万能钥匙

trans.tran_cn: 旋转，转动，万能钥匙，捻弄，旋转的东西

trans.tran_en: If you twirl something or if it twirls, it turns around and around with a smooth, fast movement

trans.tran_cn: （使）快速转动，（使）快速旋转，扭动，卷曲
